## MarkerTechniqueParams.vAlignment property

Text position inside a line.

 The \[\[placements\]\] attribute may supersede it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
vAlignment?: DynamicProperty<"Above" | "Center" | "Below">;
```
